alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:43AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG...EASTERN CLARION AND FOREST COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM EDT... At 843 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Chapman State Park to 7 miles north of New Bethlehem. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarion, Brookville, Marienville, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, Tionesta, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Strattanville, Summerville, Limestone, Hawthorn, Corsica, Sigel, Fryburg, Fisher, Leeper, Kellettville, and West Hickory. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 60 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
